entry.name: Linux_SSH_TCPUDP
entry.description: Displays a summary of all network sockets, traffic, and other statistics via the SS command.
entry.technology:
* Net-tools must be available.*
Requires property source addCategory_Linux_SSH, OR be a linux host and have ssh.user and ssh.pass applied as properties.

attribute.name: scriptgroovy

datapoint.name: ICMPv6_sockets
datapoint.description: Count of Internet Control Message Protocol for IPv6 sockets

datapoint.name: TCP_Ack_Timeout_Time
datapoint.description: Acknowledge timeout, unit is millisecond. Used for TCP delayed acknowledgment mode.

datapoint.name: TCP_Max_Segment_Size
datapoint.description: Maximum segment size you let peers know you will accept. Unit: bytes

datapoint.name: TCP_Max_Transmission_Unit
datapoint.description: Path maximum transmission value. Unit: bytes

datapoint.name: TCP_Min_Roundtrip_Time
datapoint.description: Minimum round trip time, min time a packet to travel from source to destination. Unit: miliseconds

datapoint.name: UDP_Ack_Timeout_Time
datapoint.description: Acknowledge timeout, unit is millisecond. Used for UDP delayed acknowledgment mode.

datapoint.name: UDP_Max_Segment_Size
datapoint.description: Maximum segment size you let peers know you will accept. Unit: bytes

datapoint.name: UDP_Max_Transmission_Unit
datapoint.description: Path maximum transmission value. Unit: bytes

datapoint.name: UDP_Min_Roundtrip_Time
datapoint.description: Minimum round trip time, min time a packet to travel from source to destination. Unit: miliseconds
